"Chase out the Bal Lodos!":
"When I put in my battle cry and spirit to start
preparations, something worrying at the
arrowhead cropped up!
Somehow, seems like it is the turf of the Bal Lodos!

I think they are invaders and if they attack this way,
it will be dangerous, and if something happens,
it will be too late! Could you chase them away?

*Target Bal Lodos"

"気合を入れて準備開始、って矢先に
困ったことがおきたの！
どうやら会場付近は、バル・ロドスの
縄張りだったみたい！

侵入者と思って攻撃してくる危険性もあるし
何かおきてからじゃ遅いよね！
追い払ってくれないかな？

※バル・ロドスが対象"
